summary:
I am an individual who is passionate about systems analysis and design, having majored in this very subject area. 

My career path has driven me through IT Audit and Advisory, where I have had the opportunity to gain experience in being a part of various projects i.e. Business Continuity, Business Process Analysis, IT Policy Development and IT Audit. My most recent career path has lead me into SAP IT Finance, Controlling and SD, GRC as well as Business intelligence with Qlikview, Qliksense, Tableau and BISS BOA.

school.name: University of South Africa/Universiteit van Suid-Afrika
University of KwaZulu-Natal / University of Natal

profile_positions.description:
Defined, implemented and maintained business processes and procedures to meet Finance business objectives. Analyzed and continuously identified opportunities for Finance business process improvements. Develop initiatives for continuous business process improvements. 
 
As a member of the European Finance and Controlling team, I am tasked with leveraging strong functional, operational knowledge of the related business processes involving Finance, Controlling to support end-user use of the system, and perform initial diagnoses of process issues. Subject Matter Expert role for business Controlling and related processes in SAP,  implement and lead together with Business Process Engineer Finance CO projects, new functionalities, improvements and training of user community. First line support required in specific areas.
Being an expert in SAP BW -BPC for supporting reporting requirements and planning processes.
Support execution of SAP Implementation- and Roll-out Projects in an international environment
Analyses, optimization and development of SAP Financial processes via customization based on business requirements
Being a key contact personnel for SAP Finance system related matters, analyze and resolve issues.
work with other Business Process Engineers/ Subject Matter Experts to ensure aligned and integrated processes
Provided business Support in SAP release upgrades as well as Global Finance related SAP projects
Works collaboratively with Finance business partners to help identify opportunities to streamline or automate their operations.
Alignment of Finance process related requirements with SAP teams such as Sales, Supply Chain, Logistics, Procurement and other IT and business subject matter experts
profile_positions.title: System Engineer - Finance

profile_positions.description:
*Provided business support for all Finance functions within SAP
*Assisted with the immediate resolution of system malfunction within the various finance business units
*Analysed requests received from the business for process improvements and system changes in the SAP FI environment. Identified the problems, explore business solutions & recommend appropriate cost-saving and efficient solutions.  
*Conducted risk assessments of existing internal controls and recommend measures to be put in place to reduce or eliminate risk to the business processes in relation to: 
    - System Authorizations
    - External audit requirements and reports
    - Policies and procedures 
    - Regulatory and compliance 
    - Fraud detection
    - Process variation etc.
* Assisted with the immediate resolution of systems malfunctions within the various finance business units relating to:
    - GBS Finance processing for accounts payable and accounts receivable
    - General Ledger
    - Banking systems
    - Treasury cash fund management 
    - Tax reporting and programmes
    - Travel and expenses
    - Other external application integrated with SAP
*Participate & contribute to the optimal design, configuration guide and testing of enhancements of the SAP ERP application for Financial and non-financial related modules.
* Participated and contributed to the design and documentation of new processes, including governance documents, Global Business Systems testing and mapping
*SAP configuration changes
profile_positions.title: Business Process Analyst

profile_positions.description:
During my time at RCL Foods, i have been involved in:
-Lead the development of Qlikview models and project management of the BI projects
Driving Continuous Business Improvement initiatives:
- Assist in improving and streamlining business processes and preparing business process documentation
SAP & 3rd Party End-User Support:
- Assist end users to resolve SAP FI related issues across the Vector Business.
- Resolve calls logged on service management system within agreed SLA.
- Work in conjunction with learning team, and where required, conduct end user training on existing and new System functionality.
- Conduct user assessments with the business users following training or as required
- Analyse reports on user knowledge and skills gaps provided by the learning team to identify training needs.
Application Development, Enhancement and Implementation:
- Serve as a liaison between the Business and technical consultants to ensure the implementation of identified system enhancements for  Finance.
- Review and analyse technical specification documents prior to sign off by the Applications Manager and handover to developer(s).
- End to End Test management to ensure successful delivery of Projects or enhancements.
- Execute on small Business projects requiring IT systems implementation and provide post-implementation support to all end-users
- Plan for project-related hardware and software requirements by liaising on an on-going basis with the infrastructure team and external software supplier(s).
- Compile and store project documentation (including business process flow charts, technical specifications, end user training material and project plans).
SAP User Profile Maintenance:
- Communicate with authorizations team to assist with creation and maintenance of user profiles in SAP in keeping with risk and audit standards and resolving user profile audit queries.
- Authorize user access for new and existing users via the User Authorization Request (UAR) workflow.
profile_positions.title: Junior Information Technology Business Analyst - Business Intelligence/ Shared Services

profile_positions.description:
During my time at KPMG, I have been involved in a number of audit and advisory projects within a wide range of sectors including manufacturing and service industries. 

 Since joining, I have been involved in numerous IT general control reviews (in both the public and private sectors), extensive application control reviews (ACR), extensive Business Continuity Reviews and development of Business Continuity Policy and Plan and I have performed data analytics (using computer aided techniques). I have also gained experience in performing business process analyses, IT risk assessments.
 My career at KPMG has involved extensive travel within South Africa as well as Zimbabwe and Swaziland and my key skills and experience includes:
• IT General Controls
• Business Process Analysis
• Application Controls Reviews 
• Data Analytics 
• IT Internal Audit
• Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery Plan Reviews and Development
• Technical and Functional Assessments of IT Applications

 At each of these projects, I have been tasked with various project management tasks, including:
• Document control (creation, filing, tracking, version control)
• Project control (initiation, tracking, reporting, risk management, budget analysis)
• Liaising with all levels of management (hosting client interviews, meetings, and workshops)

 Skills and experience:
• Business Process Analysis and Mapping
• SDLC Analysis (various methodologies)
• Requirements gathering
• Pre and Post Implementation reviews for various ERPs (Assessment of functional and non-functional requirements)
• Data Analytics 
• IT Internal and External Audit

 Tools used:
•Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Project, Visio)
•UML (Activity Diagrams)
profile_positions.title: Analyst
